Text,26.13: 尸检报告: 死亡了{0}秒了!

Text,27.0: Body Report: The killer appears to be {0}!
Text,27.13: 尸检报告: 凶手似乎是{0}!

Text,28.0: Body Report: The killer appears to be a {0} color!
Text,28.13: 尸检报告: 凶手似乎是{0}的颜色!

Text,29.0: Body Report: The corpse is too old to gain information from!
Text,29.13: 尸检报告: 尸体死亡太久了无法获取信息!

Text,32.13: 灵媒信息: 有人死了

Text,38.0: The Swapper can't start an emergency meeting
Text,38.13: 换票师不能召开紧急会议

Text,39.0: The Jester can't start an emergency meeting
Text,39.13: 小丑不能召开紧急会议

Text,40.0: The Lawyer can't start an emergency meeting
Text,40.13: 律师不能召开紧急会议

Text,41.0: The Prosecutor can't start an emergency meeting
Text,41.13: 检察官不能召开紧急会议

Text,46.0: Sorry, cannot make room public at the moment
Text,46.13: 抱歉，目前房间无法公开

RPCText,3.0: Your Bomb will explode in {0} seconds!
RPCText,3.13: 您的炸弹将在{0}秒内爆炸！

SpecialMediumInfo,1.13: 哎呀，枪走火了！[警长自杀].

SpecialMediumInfo,2.0: MAYBE I cursed the person next to me and killed myself. Oops.
SpecialMediumInfo,2.13: 啊哦，我好像把自己咒死了耶。[术士死于自杀].

SpecialMediumInfo,3.0: I tried to steal the gun from their pocket, but they were just happy to see me.
SpecialMediumInfo,3.13: 我试图从他们口袋里偷枪，却把自己害死了。[窃贼自杀].

SpecialMediumInfo,4.0: I wanted to get out of this toxic relationship anyways.
SpecialMediumInfo,4.13: 无论如何，我都想摆脱这种有毒的关系。[带着恋人死去].

SpecialMediumInfo,5.0: The love of my life died, thus with a kiss I die.
SpecialMediumInfo,5.13: 在天愿作比翼鸟,在地愿为连理枝，所爱以逝，吾亦寻之。[被恋人带死].

SpecialMediumInfo,6.0: My client killed me. Do I still get paid?
SpecialMediumInfo,6.13: 我的客户杀了我。我还能得到报酬吗？[律师被客户杀害].

SpecialMediumInfo,7.0: First they sidekicked me, then they killed me. At least I don't need to do tasks anymore.
SpecialMediumInfo,7.13: 既已纳我为伍，何必取我性命，算了，至少不用做任务了。[跟班被豺狼杀害].

SpecialMediumInfo,8.0: I guess they confused me for the Spy, is there even one?
SpecialMediumInfo,8.13: 他们肯定是把我当成卧底才杀了我，有没有？[内鬼死于队友].

SpecialMediumInfo,9.0: Is my dead body some kind of art now or... aaand it's gone.
SpecialMediumInfo,9.13: 我的尸体现在是某种艺术还是……啊，它不见了。[尸体被清理或吃了].

SpecialMediumInfo,10.0: If my role hasn't been saved, there's no {0} in the game anymore.
SpecialMediumInfo,10.13: 如果我死了,那么场上将不在有{0}了.

SpecialMediumInfo,11.0: I was a {0} without another role.
SpecialMediumInfo,11.13: 我是一个{0}没有其他额外的职业了.

SpecialMediumInfo,12.0: I'm not sure, but I guess a {0} color killed me.
SpecialMediumInfo,12.13: 我不确定, 但是我认为是一个有着{0}颜色的人杀了我.

SpecialMediumInfo,13.0: If I counted correctly, I died {0}s before the next meeting started.
SpecialMediumInfo,13.13: 如果我没记错的话, 我在会议前{0}秒就死了.

SpecialMediumInfo,14.0: It seems like my killer is the {0}.
SpecialMediumInfo,14.13: 我想那杀我的凶手职业应该是{0}.

ChineseText,3.0: 名玩家为无刀独立阵营职业
